Package ospi.park.library

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • ospi.park.library.Book
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Crime, Drama
    public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defined all the fields for the Books. It deals with reading the data from the file book.txt and setting \& getting value for each field.
    Author:
    jamoo File Name: Book.java Date: May 07, 2021 Assumptions: All the inputs are supposed to be in same format as shown to the user while prompting. File configurations are as follows: isbn,id,title,authorFirstName,authorLastName,pages,date,borrower,bookType
